biotools.summary:
Mining transcriptomics and clinical data reveals ACE2 expression modulators and identifies cardiomyopathy as a risk factor for mortality in COVID-19 patients.

GENEVA allows you to identify RNA-sequencing datasets from the Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) that contains conditions modulating a gene or a gene signature. See the Help page fore more detail.
